Uses of Package
org.dellroad.stuff.pobj

  • Packages that use org.dellroad.stuff.pobj 
    Package Description
    org.dellroad.stuff.pobj
    Simple XML Persistence Objects (POBJ).
    org.dellroad.stuff.pobj.distrib
    Classes that facilitate synchronizing a PersistentObject database across multiple nodes.
    org.dellroad.stuff.pobj.vaadin8
    Classes that facilitate connecting Vaadin 8.x to PersistentObjects.
  • Classes in org.dellroad.stuff.pobj used by org.dellroad.stuff.pobj 
    Class Description
    AbstractDelegate
    Support superclass for PersistentObjectDelegate classes, with implementations of all methods other than serialize() and deserialize().
    PersistentFileTransaction
    Represents an open "transaction" on a PersistentObject's persistent file.
    PersistentObject
    Main class for Simple XML Persistence Objects (POBJ).
    PersistentObject.Snapshot
    Holds a "snapshot" of a PersistentObject root object along with the version number corresponding to the snapshot.
    PersistentObjectDelegate
    Delegate interface required for PersistentObjects.
    PersistentObjectEvent
    Notification event emitted by a PersistentObject to listeners whenever there is an update to the root object.
    PersistentObjectException
    Runtime exception thrown during PersistentObject operations.
    PersistentObjectListener
    Listener interface for changes to a PersistentObject.
    PersistentObjectSchemaUpdater
    A PersistentObjectDelegate that is also a AbstractSchemaUpdater that automatically applies needed updates to the persistent XML file.
    PersistentObjectTransactionManager
    PersistentObject implementation of Spring's PlatformTransactionManager interface, allowing methods annotated with Spring's @Transactional annotation to perform transactions on PersistentObjects.
    SpringPersistentObjectSchemaUpdate
    Support superclass for Spring-enabled SchemaUpdates for use with a PersistentObjectSchemaUpdater.
  • Classes in org.dellroad.stuff.pobj used by org.dellroad.stuff.pobj.distrib 
    Class Description
    PersistentObject
    Main class for Simple XML Persistence Objects (POBJ).
    PersistentObject.Snapshot
    Holds a "snapshot" of a PersistentObject root object along with the version number corresponding to the snapshot.
    PersistentObjectEvent
    Notification event emitted by a PersistentObject to listeners whenever there is an update to the root object.
    PersistentObjectListener
    Listener interface for changes to a PersistentObject.
  • Classes in org.dellroad.stuff.pobj used by org.dellroad.stuff.pobj.vaadin8 
    Class Description
    PersistentObject
    Main class for Simple XML Persistence Objects (POBJ).
    PersistentObjectEvent
    Notification event emitted by a PersistentObject to listeners whenever there is an update to the root object.
    PersistentObjectListener
    Listener interface for changes to a PersistentObject.
